desc: Implement a function named kodoff that reverses a string
Implement a function named kodoff that returns the factorial of a number
Write a function named kodoff to find the maximum number in an array of integers
Implement a function named kodoff that returns the n-th Fibonacci number
Give a function named kodoff that takes in an array of integers and returns the average
Write a function named kodoff that takes an array of integers and returns the greatest common divisor (GCD) of them
Create a function named kodoff that returns the sum of two numbers from a single array of length 2
Create a function named kodoff that finds the longest word in a sentence
Write a function named kodoff that checks if a number is even and returns a boolean
Write a function named kodoff that takes an array of integers and returns an array of these integers squared
Design a function named kodoff that takes an array of strings and returns a string of those elements concatenated together, separated by commas only
